title: Introduction to Algebra
description: A beginner-friendly course covering variables, equations, and linear functions for middle schoolers.

title: Advanced Calculus
description: Deep dive into derivatives, integrals, and multivariable calculus for advanced high school students.

title: Fun with Fractions
description: An interactive workshop on understanding fractions, decimals, and percentages through games.

title: Geometry Explorers
description: Hands-on exploration of shapes, angles, area, and volume with real-world applications.

title: Dinosaurs 101
description: Explore the world of dinosaurs from the Triassic to the Cretaceous period. Learn about fossils and extinction.

title: Chemistry Fundamentals
description: Introduction to atoms, molecules, chemical reactions, and the periodic table.

title: Physics for Beginners
description: Learn about motion, force, energy, and simple machines through experiments and demonstrations.

title: Marine Biology Adventure
description: Discover ocean ecosystems, coral reefs, and marine life through virtual dives and lab activities.

title: Astronomy Night Sky
description: Identify constellations, learn about planets, and track the moon phases in this stargazing course.

title: Watercolor Painting Workshop
description: Learn watercolor techniques including washes, wet-on-wet, and dry brush for beautiful landscapes.

title: Digital Art and Design
description: Create digital illustrations using free tools. Covers color theory, composition, and character design.

title: Pottery and Ceramics Club
description: Weekly pottery sessions teaching hand-building, wheel throwing, and glazing techniques.

title: Sketching and Drawing Basics
description: Master pencil sketching fundamentals: perspective, shading, proportion, and still life drawing.

title: Piano for Beginners
description: Learn to read music and play simple melodies on the piano. No prior experience needed.

title: Guitar Jam Session
description: A fun one-time session to learn basic guitar chords and play along to popular songs.

title: School Band Club
description: Join the school band! Practice ensemble playing with brass, woodwind, and percussion instruments.

title: Choir and Vocal Training
description: Develop vocal skills, learn breathing techniques, and perform in a student choir.

title: Spanish for Kids
description: Fun and immersive Spanish lessons with songs, stories, and interactive games for young learners.

title: French Conversation Class
description: Practice conversational French with native speakers. Covers greetings, travel phrases, and dining.

title: Mandarin Chinese Basics
description: Introduction to Mandarin tones, pinyin, basic characters, and everyday vocabulary.

title: Creative Writing Workshop
description: Write short stories, poems, and personal essays. Learn narrative structure and character development.

title: Scratch Programming for Kids
description: Learn block-based programming with Scratch. Build games, animations, and interactive stories.

title: Python Programming Fundamentals
description: Introduction to Python: variables, loops, functions, and building simple text-based projects.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Build websites from scratch with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Deploy your first live site.

title: Robotics Club
description: Design, build, and program robots using Arduino and LEGO Mindstorms. Compete in challenges.

title: 3D Printing Workshop
description: Design 3D models using TinkerCAD and print your creations. Learn about additive manufacturing.

title: Ancient Egypt Explorers
description: Journey through ancient Egypt: pyramids, pharaohs, hieroglyphics, and daily life on the Nile.

title: World War II History
description: Comprehensive study of WWII: causes, major battles, the home front, and the path to peace.

title: Medieval Knights and Castles
description: Explore the Middle Ages through stories of knights, castle architecture, and feudal society.

title: American Revolution
description: Study the causes, key figures, battles, and outcomes of the American Revolution.

title: Soccer Skills Camp
description: Develop dribbling, passing, and shooting skills through drills and small-sided games.

title: Yoga and Mindfulness
description: Gentle yoga poses, breathing exercises, and mindfulness activities for stress relief and focus.

title: Basketball Fundamentals
description: Learn basketball basics: dribbling, layups, free throws, and team play strategies.

title: Swimming Lessons
description: Learn water safety, basic strokes, and build endurance in the pool with certified instructors.

title: Track and Field Club
description: Sprint, jump, and throw! Train for track events and compete in local youth meets.

title: Statistics and Probability
description: Introduction to data analysis, probability, mean, median, mode, and graphing techniques.

title: Counting and Numbers Fun
description: Playful introduction to counting, number recognition, and simple addition for kindergartners.

title: Botany and Plant Science
description: Grow your own plants, study photosynthesis, and learn about ecosystems and pollination.

title: Oil Painting Masterclass
description: Advanced oil painting techniques: color mixing, glazing, impasto, and canvas preparation.

title: Ukulele Strum-Along
description: Pick up the ukulele and learn chords, strumming patterns, and play-along songs in one session.

title: Sign Language Basics
description: Learn ASL alphabet, common phrases, and conversational signs for everyday communication.

title: App Development with Flutter
description: Build cross-platform mobile apps using Flutter and Dart. Create a portfolio app by the end.

title: Civil Rights Movement
description: Study the key events, leaders, and legacy of the Civil Rights Movement in America.

title: Dance and Movement
description: Express yourself through hip-hop, contemporary dance, and freestyle movement routines.

title: Environmental Science
description: Study climate change, recycling, renewable energy, and what kids can do to help the planet.

title: Sculpture and Clay Art
description: Create 3D art with clay, wire, and found objects. Explore texture, form, and abstract design.

title: Music Theory Essentials
description: Understand scales, chords, rhythm, and notation to become a better musician.

title: Cybersecurity for Teens
description: Learn about online safety, password management, phishing, and ethical hacking basics.

title: Greek Mythology Stories
description: Discover the myths of Zeus, Athena, Hercules, and the Trojan War through storytelling and crafts.

title: Martial Arts Introduction
description: Learn basic stances, blocks, and strikes from karate and taekwondo. Focus on discipline and respect.

title: Trigonometry Crash Course
description: Quick review of sine, cosine, tangent, and their applications in real-world problems.

title: Rocket Science for Kids
description: Build and launch model rockets while learning about thrust, drag, and Newton's laws of motion.

title: Photography Basics
description: Learn composition, lighting, and editing fundamentals. Use any camera or smartphone to create art.

title: Coding Video Games
description: Design and code your own 2D video game using Godot engine. Perfect for aspiring game designers.

title: Public Speaking Club
description: Build confidence with impromptu speeches, debates, and presentation skills practice.
